creator: jay.ebert@wirelesscar.com
text:
The WebApp module fails to make on Solaris 2.8 due to the following errors:

/opt/sfw/bin//gcc -g -O2    -DSOLARIS2=8 -D_POSIX_PTHREAD_SEMANTICS -
D_REENTRANT   -I/export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/apr/include -I/export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/include -c "wa_main.c" -o "wa_main.o"
In file included from /export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/apr/include/apr_general.h:61,
                 from /export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/include/wa.h:77,
                 from wa_main.c:59:
/export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/apr/include/apr.h:198: #error Can not determine the proper size for 
apr_int64_t
/export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/apr/include/apr.h:253: #error Can not determine the proper size for 
ssize_t
/export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/apr/include/apr.h:256: #error Can not determine the proper size for size_t
/export/spare/home/web/apache_1.3.26/webapp-module-1.0-
tc40/apr/include/apr.h:265: #error Can not determine the proper size for 
apr_int64_t
*** Error code 1

******

I've downloaded about 5 different versions of Apache, webapp-module, etc. over 
the past 4 days without any luck.  This is either a bug in the code or 
install/make README files. Without this fix, I will be forced to use Tomcat 
only to service the web requests.

Please update this report to indicate the Version of the WebApp connector
  you are trying to build.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
jay.ebert@wirelesscar.com
text:
Here are the versions:

webapp-module-1.0-tc40
gcc 1.3.4
Solaris 2.8
libtool 1.3.4


Here is the error from make:

ssize_t

Please use mod_jk, or jk2"
creator: funkman@joedog.org
